overview: Neri, a female researcher, works to find ways to improve the soil during a crisis that plagues papaya crops, which in turn affects the land. Using organic fertilisers such as her menstrual blood, Neri embarks on a journey of self-doubt and re-connection with herself, and with her mother, and explores the wisdom of the moon and plants to germinate, grow and harvest the fruits of the papaya plant.
title: Frutabomba
